FROM (SELECT entpr_nm as entprNm ,entpr_ceo as entprCeo ,(SELECT common_nm FROM ta_common WHERE group_cd ='G00002' AND LEFT(common_cd,2) = large_buss_area_cd ) as largeBussAreaCd ,if(entpr_head_tel = '' ,'' ,if( left(entpr_head_tel,2) = "02" ,concat(left(entpr_head_tel,2),"-",mid(entpr_head_tel,3,4),"-",right(entpr_head_tel,4)) ,concat(left(entpr_head_tel,3),"-",mid(entpr_head_tel,4,4),"-",right(entpr_head_tel,4)) ) ) as entprHeadTel ,if(entpr_head_addr !=null ,substr(entpr_head_addr,9,2) ,substr(entpr_branch_addr,9,2) ) as entprHeadAddr ,member_id as memberId ,reg_dt as regDt FROM tb_enterprise) a WHERE 1=1

AND a.entprNm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
AND a.entprCeo LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
